summary: An ordinance relating to the Police and Fire Departments; modifying the conditions of employment therein by requiring certain members (Classes "C" and "D") to lay off a total of seven and one-half (7 1/2) days without pay during the period January 1, 1938 to January 1, 1939, in order to reduce expenses and conform to the 1938 budgets of said departments; and suspending all ordinances or parts thereof in conflict herewith.
